structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office For Administration And Finance

law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 39. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] The commissioner may apply for and accept on behalf of the commonwealth any funds, including grants, bequests, gifts or contributions, from any person. Such funds shall be deposited in a separate account with the state treasurer and received by him on behalf of the commonwealth. All such funds may be expended by the commissioner in accordance with law. The commissioner shall from time to time promulgate regulations governing the expenditure of such funds by himself and by the secretaries having charge of the executive offices established by chapter six A.
